【考法 1】 n. 敌意：a usually prejudiced and often spiteful or malevolent ill will, enmity
【例】She felt no animus toward those who had wronged her. 她对那些冤枉了她的人没有敌意。
【近】animosity, antagonism, antipathy[æn'tɪpəθɪ], hostility[hɒ'stɪlɪtɪ], rancor
【反】friendliness, amity, amenity 友好
【记】 象enemy 敌人，及animal 畜生
